mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, userId, userName, subject, content, created, hitCount, saveFileName, originalFileName) VALUES (bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{saveFileName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{originalFileName, jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT num, b.userId, b.userName, subject, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, hitCount, saveFileName FROM bbs b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, b.userId, b.userName, subject, content, created, hitCount, saveFileName, originalFileName FROM bbs b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbs b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE bbs SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, saveFileName = #{saveFileName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, originalFileName = #{originalFileName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
